Text: Oñ Jihofa dʼef unyabo ujeju aje̩tachi Sainai ako̩la ñwu Mose̩s, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ekeji, o̩do̩ ekeji, ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti awa, i kakini,
E̩ nafʼuwewe oji one̩ o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, owñ chʼaluka odu one̩ odu one̩-ma, oji oji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-ma du;
owñ chʼabo du ku ma jʼef abo Israe̩l kʼo̩do̩-ma jo̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ ku ma nʼukpahiu ku ma anyi oko ogu. Uwe̩ kpai Aro̩n ki fʼuma kaluka udala udala.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi kwʼef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du amanyʼuwe̩; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo le̩ achʼuto̩gba unyi amata-wñ.
Odu aboke̩le̩ ku ma la adago manyʼuwe̩ le̩ de̩: E̩ne̩ Rube̩n chʼE̩lize̩r o̩ma Shede̩ur;
e̩ne̩ Simeo̩n che She̩lumie̩l o̩ma Zuri-shadai;
e̩ne̩ Juda che Nasho̩n o̩ma Aminadab;
e̩ne̩ Isakar che Netane̩l o̩ma Zuar;
e̩ne̩ Ze̩biulo̩n che Eliab o̩ma Helo̩n;
abo amo̩ma Jose̩f, e-e̩ne̩ Ifraim che E̩lishama o̩ma Amihud; e̩ne̩ Manasa che Gamelie̩l o̩ma Pedazur;
e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin che Abidan o̩ma Gideoni;
e̩ne̩ Dan che Ahieze̩r o̩ma Amishadai;
e̩ne̩ Ashe̩r che Pagie̩l o̩ma Okran;
e̩ne̩ Gad che Eliasaf o̩ma De̩ue̩l;
e̩ne̩ Naftali chʼAhira o̩ma Enan.
Abo-i chʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ ku ma do̩, amidachi o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amatama ma che; ama chʼoji oji amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e-abo Israe̩l.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n mʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma do̩ odu-ma le̩ ko,

oñ ma fʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka do̩ jeju ugbokate o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ekeji, taku ma choli ebi ku ma bi ma akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, alu kʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma de̩, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, oji one̩ oji one̩-ma,
alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s. Abe̩le̩ i fʼuma kaluka ef aje̩tachi Sainai le̩.

Oñ amo̩ma Rube̩n, o̩mo̩gba Israe̩l le̩, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, oji one̩ oji one̩-ma, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du kʼo̩do̩-wñ jo̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩fa nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.

E-amo̩ma Simeo̩n o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, abo-ma ku ma kaluka likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, oji one̩ oji one̩-ma, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩.
Abo e-o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ooje nyoke me̩la nyʼone̩ oli me̩fa.
E-amo̩ma Gad o̩gba o̩gbo-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo o̩lo̩pu Gad ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwe̩ta.
E-amo̩ma Juda o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Juda ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo e̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa.
E-amo̩ma Isakar o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Isakar ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩le̩ nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
E-amo̩ma Ze̩biulo̩n o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ugbo ooje nyoke mebie nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko.

E-amo̩ma Jose̩f: owñ chʼe-amo̩ma Ifraim o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩;
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Ifraim ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
E-amo̩ma Manasa o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Manasa ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke meji nyʼone̩ ogwoko.
E-amo̩ma Be̩njamin, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
E-amo̩ma Dan, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Dan ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwe̩le̩.
E-amo̩ma Ashe̩r, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r ku ma kaluka le̩, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
E-amo̩ma Naftali, o̩gba o̩gba-ma akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Naftali ku ma kaluka le̩, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma kaluka le̩, owñ chʼabo ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai amidachi e-abo Israe̩l ku ma chʼone̩ me̩gweji kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma koji unyi ata-wñ le̩ kʼuma aluka.
Abe̩le̩ aluka amo̩ma Israe̩l du, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, owñ chʼabo du ku ma jʼefu abo Israe̩l ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩—
aluka-ma du chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩gwa nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwaka.
Ma muda kaluka o̩lo̩pu amata abo Lifai efu-ma n.
Todu Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Chai o̩lo̩pu abo Lifai kate oñ e̩ ma kaluka n, e̩ ki la fʼoji one̩-ma lo tʼef amo̩ma Israe̩l in;

e̩ ki la ko abo Lifai jo̩ ku ma nʼo̩da uña ugugu e-ibenu le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka kpai e̩wñ kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ du ki jʼo̩la-wñ; ama ane̩ uña ugugu le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka, oñ ama ache e̩wñ ñw u, uru-ma la ale uña ugugu le̩ daka.
Tak e̩gba kʼuña ugugu le̩ achi e̩re̩ nyʼo̩gba, abo Lifai amʼu ta wane̩; oñ e̩gba ku ma che ku ma fʼuña ugugu le̩ fa dago, abo Lifai le̩ afa dago. E̩ne̩ ejaduña te̩me̩rʼu, ekpa ma akpa.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l afa unyabo e-ma udala udala, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ adʼugbo uru-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la adʼugbo agaliga e-wñ.
Abo Lifai muda afa unyabo-ma lʼuña ugugu ibenu le̩ daka, todu kʼuwe̩do̩ ki we ebʼo̩gbadu amo̩ma Israe̩l ma; abo Lifai la ade e̩wñ ide uña e-ugugue̩-ibenu le̩.
Amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼabe̩le̩ che; likpa e̩wñ du ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, abe̩le̩ ma che.
